name: It's me.
description:
This is a game about mental illness, and its effects on those who have it and those around those who have it.  It was made in 48 hours as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The theme for this jam was "Out of Control", to which I applied this idea I had about a year ago. The game is 5 days long, however depending on your actions it may end early.

I did not have enough time to fully playtest every combination of choices, however I have thoroughly reviewed the code itself.

Controls: You simply type the number of the dialogue choice you want to pick. Anything that isn't a number may cause problems.

Note: If the timer appears stuck, click on the window and press the down arrow a few times. That happens if you click around elsewhere.
